timeline.bodyText: Check null and empty both or just use CollectionUtils.isEmpty
timeline.author: psh-axelor

timeline.bodyText:
If we want to set birtTemplate in Template then birtTemplate should be imported first (as done in demo)
Sequence should be like,
<input file="base_birtTemplate.csv"..
<input file="base_birtTemplateParameter.csv"..
<input file="base_template.csv"..
and test it properly
timeline.author: psh-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,7 +13,9 @@
         <bind to="canExport" eval="can_export == 'x' ? 'true' : 'false'"/>
     </input>
 
-    <input file="base_template.csv" separator=";" type="com.axelor.apps.message.db.Template"  search="self.name = :name"  />
+    <input file="base_template.csv" separator=";" type="com.axelor.apps.message.db.Template"  search="self.name = :name"  >
